title: Fig. 2. Number of funded and not-funded articles from the Journal of Gastric Cancer, according to year.

claim: The proportion of original articles funded was 39 out of 113 articles (34.5%) (Fig. 2).
title: Fig. 3. National origins of authors of 209 articles from the Journal of Gastric Cancer-from 2011 to 2015.

claim: Out of them, 183 articles were from Korea, 11 were from Japan, and 7 were from USA (Fig. 3).
title: Fig. 4. Total citations of the Journal of Gastric Cancer from 2011 to 2015-from the Web of Science Core Collection [cited 2016 Jan 30].

claim: The total citations increased from 1 in 2011 to 245 in 2015 (Fig. 4).
title: Fig. 5. National origins of authors of who cited the Journal of Gastric Cancer from 2011 to 2015-from the Web of Science Core Collection [cited 2016 Jan 30].

claim: The top-ranking countries of citing authors were China (171), Korea (158), and Japan (75) (Fig. 5).
